job_history.work_description: Lead person for all aspects of close, including preparing and entering 30 journal entries and preparation of 35 balance sheet reconciliations. Developed new and easier ways of doing journal entries for month end process, using Microsoft Excel. Have reduced journal entry keying by a day and half, allowing more time for analysis. Revamped old cost reporting and 990 templates, using Excel, to make the process easier for colleagues that would enter information into the system. Have cut down lead and processing time for each, making the entire submission time faster for system senior leadership.

Assisted in financial month end close, by preparing over 20 journal entries and 25 Balance Sheet reconciliations. Developed various sales, TGP, and other contribution margin reports, using Microsoft Access and Excel. Led the division in creating projects that would strip out relevant information from a report and put into Excel, using Monarch data mining software. Developed over 30 models for the division to use. Developed Excel macros to help make entering journal entries easier at month end.

Accountable for the coding and paying of all Accounts Payable invoices. Including getting management signature, along with following up on and invoice discrepancies. Assisted in getting purchase orders from warehouse and entering in our purchase order system. Developed a new spreadsheet to help track fuel expense and tracking for operations.

Accountable for inventory for all 15 Sprint stores in our area. Led month end inventory counts, where each store would send me their results and I would match up to purchase order and sales to make sure everything tied out. Accountable for process of stolen, warranty and damaged phones, by making sure we received correct credit back from Sprint.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling balance sheet reconciliations and journal entries across multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over two decades of experience with all aspects of accounting including financial close, journal entries, and asset management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Has extensively used Excel for various tasks such as preparing journal entries, balance sheet reconciliations, and developing reports, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams and projects in various roles, including leading the division in creating projects and developing new processes, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Has developed new and easier ways of doing tasks, such as journal entries and cost reporting, and has reduced processing time for various tasks, indicating strong proficiency in process improvement.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has developed various reports and models using Microsoft Access and Excel, and has used data mining software to strip out relevant information, indicating strong proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Accounting Software
skills.explanation: Has used various accounting software, including Microsoft Access and Excel, and has developed macros to help make entering journal entries easier, indicating strong proficiency in accounting software.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has led projects and developed new processes, but the scope of these projects is not as extensive as other skills, indicating solid working proficiency in project management.
